backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing enquiries with incrementing IDs, supporting submission and retrieval operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend feature additions related to Major Projects featured image handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in the appâ€™s layout, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring light/dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root layout for all site pages.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying project title, location, and description.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable card component showing a service icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying branding, navigation links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login/logout flows using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting enquiries through an actor and invalidates the enquiries query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes across the app.
frontend/src/lib/validation/enquiryValid: Validates enquiry form fields for required values, email format, and message length, returning errors if invalid.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/EnquiryPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via useSubmitEnquiry, and displays direct contact details.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a grid of gallery images with modal dialog previews for each image.
frontend/src/pages/MajorClientsPage.tsx: Displays a list of major clients with a featured image and client cards.
frontend/src/pages/MajorProjectsPage.tsx: Renders major project descriptions with a hero image and ProjectCard components.
frontend/src/pages/QualitySafetyPolicyPa: Renders the Quality and Safety Policy page with sections for quality commitment, safety practices, and compliance using cards and imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of electrical services using ServiceCard components along with a hero image and intro text.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedElectricalCont: Implements the landing page with a hero section, company overview, and highlight cards promoting BM Enterprises' strengths.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, features, requirements, and image needs for the BM Enterprises website.
